original_title: Fifi and the Flowertots 2: Fifi's in Charge
overview: More animated fun with Fifi and her friends in the Flowertot garden. In these episodes, the Tots hold a sports day, and Fifi discovers that running a shop is harder than it looks. Episodes are: 'Fifi's in Charge'; 'Sports Day'; 'Stingo Gets Stuck'; 'Fee-Fi-Fo-Fum Fifi'; and 'Hole Lot of Fun'.
title: Fifi and the Flowertots 2: Fifi's in Charge
